sources.title: The Phantom (1943) TOM TYLERüçï15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Tom Tyler, Jeanne Bates, Ernie Adams
Directed by: B. Reeves Eason

Deep into the heart of Africa, a professor and his lovely daughter search for the Lost City of Zoloz and its vast hidden treasure. Complicating their expedition is an international criminal who plans to destroy the peace with the local native tribes and build a secret air base at Zoloz. Can Dr. Max Bremmer, aka The Phantom, with his superhuman strength, overpower the enemy factions and restore peace to the jungle?

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Intro
1:03       CHAPTER 1: The Sign of the Skull
29:24     CHAPTER 2: The Man Who Never Dies
48:06     CHAPTER 3: A Traitor's Code
1:04:23  CHAPTER 4: The Seat of Judgment
1:20:45  CHAPTER 5: The Ghost Who Walks
1:38:06  CHAPTER 6: Jungle Whispers
1:53:24  CHAPTER 7: The Mystery Well
2:10:23  CHAPTER 8: In Quest of the Keys
2:27:23  CHAPTER 9: The Fire Princess
2:43:28  CHAPTER 10: The Chamber of Death
2:59:07  CHAPTER 11: The Emerald Key
3:14:59  CHAPTER 12: The Fangs of the Beast
3:31:27  CHAPTER 13: The Road to Zoloz
3:48:05  CHAPTER 14: The Lost City
4:04:48  CHAPTER 15: Peace in the Jungle
4:21:08 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Professor Davidson and his niece Diana Palmer search Africa for the Lost City of Zoloz, reputed to be the source of a large hidden treasure. Also searching is a local crook, Singapore Smith, and Dr. Max Bremmer, who plans to destroy the peace in which the native tribes have been living. However, Godfrey Prescott, otherwise known as the Phantom, is feared and respected by the natives and is able to circumvent the traps and schemes of the villains.
metadata.Writer: Morgan Cox, Victor McLeod, Sherman L. Lowe
metadata.Actors: Tom Tyler, Jeanne Bates, Ernie Adams
